00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LNET
00038 
00039 #include <lnet/lib-lnet.h>
00040 #include <lnet/lnetctl.h>
00041 
00042 #define LNET_MSG_MASK           (LNET_PUT_BIT | LNET_ACK_BIT | \
00043                                  LNET_GET_BIT | LNET_REPLY_BIT)
00044 
00045 struct lnet_drop_rule {
00047         struct list_head        dr_link;
00049         struct lnet_fault_attr  dr_attr;
00051         spinlock_t              dr_lock;
00056         unsigned long           dr_drop_at;
00060         cfs_time_t              dr_drop_time;
00062         cfs_time_t              dr_time_base;
00064         struct lnet_fault_stat  dr_stat;
00065 };
00066 
00067 static bool
00068 lnet_fault_nid_match(lnet_nid_t nid, lnet_nid_t msg_nid)
00069 {
00070         if (nid == msg_nid || nid == LNET_NID_ANY)
00071                 return true;
00072 
00073         if (LNET_NIDNET(nid) != LNET_NIDNET(msg_nid))
00074                 return false;
00075 
00076         /* 255.255.255.255@net is wildcard for all addresses in a network */
00077         return LNET_NIDADDR(nid) == LNET_NIDADDR(LNET_NID_ANY);
00078 }
00079 
00080 static bool
00081 lnet_fault_attr_match(struct lnet_fault_attr *attr, lnet_nid_t src,
00082                       lnet_nid_t dst, unsigned int type, unsigned int portal)
00083 {
00084         if (!lnet_fault_nid_match(attr->fa_src, src) ||
00085             !lnet_fault_nid_match(attr->fa_dst, dst))
00086                 return false;
00087 
00088         if (!(attr->fa_msg_mask & (1 << type)))
00089                 return false;
00090 
00091         /* NB: ACK and REPLY have no portal, but they should have been
00092          * rejected by message mask */
00093         if (attr->fa_ptl_mask != 0 && /* has portal filter */
00094             !(attr->fa_ptl_mask & (1ULL << portal)))
00095                 return false;
00096 
00097         return true;
00098 }
00099 
00100 static int
00101 lnet_fault_attr_validate(struct lnet_fault_attr *attr)
00102 {
00103         if (attr->fa_msg_mask == 0)
00104                 attr->fa_msg_mask = LNET_MSG_MASK; /* all message types */
00105 
00106         if (attr->fa_ptl_mask == 0) /* no portal filter */
00107                 return 0;
00108 
00109         /* NB: only PUT and GET can be filtered if portal filter has been set */
00110         attr->fa_msg_mask &= LNET_GET_BIT | LNET_PUT_BIT;
00111         if (attr->fa_msg_mask == 0) {
00112                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "can't find valid message type bits %x\n",
00113                        attr->fa_msg_mask);
00114                 return -EINVAL;
00115         }
00116         return 0;
00117 }
00118 
00119 static void
00120 lnet_fault_stat_inc(struct lnet_fault_stat *stat, unsigned int type)
00121 {
00122         /* NB: fs_counter is NOT updated by this function */
00123         switch (type) {
00124         case LNET_MSG_PUT:
00125                 stat->fs_put++;
00126                 return;
00127         case LNET_MSG_ACK:
00128                 stat->fs_ack++;
00129                 return;
00130         case LNET_MSG_GET:
00131                 stat->fs_get++;
00132                 return;
00133         case LNET_MSG_REPLY:
00134                 stat->fs_reply++;
00135                 return;
00136         }
00137 }
00138 
00148 static int
00149 lnet_drop_rule_add(struct lnet_fault_attr *attr)
00150 {
00151         struct lnet_drop_rule *rule;
00152         ENTRY;
00153 
00154         if (!((attr->u.drop.da_rate == 0) ^ (attr->u.drop.da_interval == 0))) {
00155                 CDEBUG(D_NET,
00156                        "please provide either drop rate or drop interval, "
00157                        "but not both at the same time %d/%d\n",
00158                        attr->u.drop.da_rate, attr->u.drop.da_interval);
00159                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00160         }
00161 
00162         if (lnet_fault_attr_validate(attr) != 0)
00163                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00164 
00165         CFS_ALLOC_PTR(rule);
00166         if (rule == NULL)
00167                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00168 
00169         spin_lock_init(&rule->dr_lock);
00170 
00171         rule->dr_attr = *attr;
00172         if (attr->u.drop.da_interval != 0) {
00173                 rule->dr_time_base = cfs_time_shift(attr->u.drop.da_interval);
00174                 rule->dr_drop_time = cfs_time_shift(cfs_rand() %
00175                                                     attr->u.drop.da_interval);
00176         } else {
00177                 rule->dr_drop_at = cfs_rand() % attr->u.drop.da_rate;
00178         }
00179 
00180         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00181         list_add(&rule->dr_link, &the_lnet.ln_drop_rules);
00182         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00183 
00184         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Added drop rule: src %s, dst %s, rate %d, interval %d\n",
00185                libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_src), libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_src),
00186                attr->u.drop.da_rate, attr->u.drop.da_interval);
00187         RETURN(0);
00188 }
00189 
00197 static int
00198 lnet_drop_rule_del(lnet_nid_t src, lnet_nid_t dst)
00199 {
00200         struct lnet_drop_rule *rule;
00201         struct lnet_drop_rule *tmp;
00202         struct list_head       zombies;
00203         int                    n = 0;
00204         ENTRY;
00205 
00206         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&zombies);
00207 
00208         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00209         list_for_each_entry_safe(rule, tmp, &the_lnet.ln_drop_rules, dr_link) {
00210                 if (rule->dr_attr.fa_src != src && src != 0)
00211                         continue;
00212 
00213                 if (rule->dr_attr.fa_dst != dst && dst != 0)
00214                         continue;
00215 
00216                 list_move(&rule->dr_link, &zombies);
00217         }
00218         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00219 
00220         list_for_each_entry_safe(rule, tmp, &zombies, dr_link) {
00221                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Remove drop rule: src %s->dst: %s (1/%d, %d)\n",
00222                        libcfs_nid2str(rule->dr_attr.fa_src),
00223                        libcfs_nid2str(rule->dr_attr.fa_dst),
00224                        rule->dr_attr.u.drop.da_rate,
00225                        rule->dr_attr.u.drop.da_interval);
00226 
00227                 list_del(&rule->dr_link);
00228                 CFS_FREE_PTR(rule);
00229                 n++;
00230         }
00231 
00232         RETURN(n);
00233 }
00234 
00238 static int
00239 lnet_drop_rule_list(int pos, struct lnet_fault_attr *attr,
00240                     struct lnet_fault_stat *stat)
00241 {
00242         struct lnet_drop_rule *rule;
00243         int                    cpt;
00244         int                    i = 0;
00245         int                    rc = -ENOENT;
00246         ENTRY;
00247 
00248         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00249         list_for_each_entry(rule, &the_lnet.ln_drop_rules, dr_link) {
00250                 if (i++ < pos)
00251                         continue;
00252 
00253                 spin_lock(&rule->dr_lock);
00254                 *attr = rule->dr_attr;
00255                 *stat = rule->dr_stat;
00256                 spin_unlock(&rule->dr_lock);
00257                 rc = 0;
00258                 break;
00259         }
00260 
00261         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00262         RETURN(rc);
00263 }
00264 
00268 static void
00269 lnet_drop_rule_reset(void)
00270 {
00271         struct lnet_drop_rule *rule;
00272         int                    cpt;
00273         ENTRY;
00274 
00275         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00276 
00277         list_for_each_entry(rule, &the_lnet.ln_drop_rules, dr_link) {
00278                 struct lnet_fault_attr *attr = &rule->dr_attr;
00279 
00280                 spin_lock(&rule->dr_lock);
00281 
00282                 memset(&rule->dr_stat, 0, sizeof(rule->dr_stat));
00283                 if (attr->u.drop.da_rate != 0) {
00284                         rule->dr_drop_at = cfs_rand() % attr->u.drop.da_rate;
00285                 } else {
00286                         rule->dr_drop_time = cfs_time_shift(cfs_rand() %
00287                                                 attr->u.drop.da_interval);
00288                         rule->dr_time_base = cfs_time_shift(attr->u.drop.
00289                                                                   da_interval);
00290                 }
00291                 spin_unlock(&rule->dr_lock);
00292         }
00293 
00294         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00295         EXIT;
00296 }
00297 
00302 static bool
00303 drop_rule_match(struct lnet_drop_rule *rule, lnet_nid_t src,
00304                 lnet_nid_t dst, unsigned int type, unsigned int portal)
00305 {
00306         struct lnet_fault_attr  *attr = &rule->dr_attr;
00307         bool                     drop;
00308 
00309         if (!lnet_fault_attr_match(attr, src, dst, type, portal))
00310                 return false;
00311 
00312         /* match this rule, check drop rate now */
00313         spin_lock(&rule->dr_lock);
00314         if (rule->dr_drop_time != 0) { /* time based drop */
00315                 cfs_time_t now = cfs_time_current();
00316 
00317                 rule->dr_stat.fs_count++;
00318                 drop = cfs_time_aftereq(now, rule->dr_drop_time);
00319                 if (drop) {
00320                         if (cfs_time_after(now, rule->dr_time_base))
00321                                 rule->dr_time_base = now;
00322 
00323                         rule->dr_drop_time = rule->dr_time_base +
00324                                              cfs_time_seconds(cfs_rand() %
00325                                                 attr->u.drop.da_interval);
00326                         rule->dr_time_base += cfs_time_seconds(attr->u.drop.
00327                                                                da_interval);
00328 
00329                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Drop Rule %s->%s: next drop : "
00330                                       CFS_TIME_T"\n",
00331                                       libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_src),
00332                                       libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_dst),
00333                                       rule->dr_drop_time);
00334                 }
00335 
00336         } else { /* rate based drop */
00337                 __u64 count;
00338 
00339                 drop = rule->dr_stat.fs_count++ == rule->dr_drop_at;
00340                 count = rule->dr_stat.fs_count;
00341                 if (do_div(count, attr->u.drop.da_rate) == 0) {
00342                         rule->dr_drop_at = rule->dr_stat.fs_count +
00343                                            cfs_rand() % attr->u.drop.da_rate;
00344                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Drop Rule %s->%s: next drop: %lu\n",
00345                                libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_src),
00346                                libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_dst), rule->dr_drop_at);
00347                 }
00348         }
00349 
00350         if (drop) { /* drop this message, update counters */
00351                 lnet_fault_stat_inc(&rule->dr_stat, type);
00352                 rule->dr_stat.u.drop.ds_dropped++;
00353         }
00354 
00355         spin_unlock(&rule->dr_lock);
00356         return drop;
00357 }
00358 
00362 bool
00363 lnet_drop_rule_match(lnet_hdr_t *hdr)
00364 {
00365         struct lnet_drop_rule   *rule;
00366         lnet_nid_t               src = le64_to_cpu(hdr->src_nid);
00367         lnet_nid_t               dst = le64_to_cpu(hdr->dest_nid);
00368         unsigned int             typ = le32_to_cpu(hdr->type);
00369         unsigned int             ptl = -1;
00370         bool                     drop = false;
00371         int                      cpt;
00372 
00373         /* NB: if Portal is specified, then only PUT and GET will be
00374          * filtered by drop rule */
00375         if (typ == LNET_MSG_PUT)
00376                 ptl = le32_to_cpu(hdr->msg.put.ptl_index);
00377         else if (typ == LNET_MSG_GET)
00378                 ptl = le32_to_cpu(hdr->msg.get.ptl_index);
00379 
00380         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00381         list_for_each_entry(rule, &the_lnet.ln_drop_rules, dr_link) {
00382                 drop = drop_rule_match(rule, src, dst, typ, ptl);
00383                 if (drop)
00384                         break;
00385         }
00386 
00387         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00388         return drop;
00389 }
00390 
00395 #define msg_delay_send           msg_ev.hdr_data
00396 
00397 struct lnet_delay_rule {
00399         struct list_head        dl_link;
00401         struct list_head        dl_sched_link;
00403         struct lnet_fault_attr  dl_attr;
00405         spinlock_t              dl_lock;
00407         atomic_t                dl_refcount;
00412         unsigned long           dl_delay_at;
00416         cfs_time_t              dl_delay_time;
00418         cfs_time_t              dl_time_base;
00420         unsigned long           dl_msg_send;
00422         struct list_head        dl_msg_list;
00424         struct lnet_fault_stat  dl_stat;
00426         struct timer_list       dl_timer;
00427 };
00428 
00429 struct delay_daemon_data {
00431         struct mutex            dd_mutex;
00433         spinlock_t              dd_lock;
00435         struct list_head        dd_sched_rules;
00437         wait_queue_head_t       dd_waitq;
00439         wait_queue_head_t       dd_ctl_waitq;
00441         unsigned int            dd_running;
00443         unsigned int            dd_stopped;
00444 };
00445 
00446 static struct delay_daemon_data delay_dd;
00447 
00448 static cfs_time_t
00449 round_timeout(cfs_time_t timeout)
00450 {
00451         return cfs_time_seconds((unsigned int)
00452                         cfs_duration_sec(cfs_time_sub(timeout, 0)) + 1);
00453 }
00454 
00455 static void
00456 delay_rule_decref(struct lnet_delay_rule *rule)
00457 {
00458         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&rule->dl_refcount)) {
00459                 LASSERT(list_empty(&rule->dl_sched_link));
00460                 LASSERT(list_empty(&rule->dl_msg_list));
00461                 LASSERT(list_empty(&rule->dl_link));
00462 
00463                 CFS_FREE_PTR(rule);
00464         }
00465 }
00466 
00471 static bool
00472 delay_rule_match(struct lnet_delay_rule *rule, lnet_nid_t src,
00473                 lnet_nid_t dst, unsigned int type, unsigned int portal,
00474                 struct lnet_msg *msg)
00475 {
00476         struct lnet_fault_attr  *attr = &rule->dl_attr;
00477         bool                     delay;
00478 
00479         if (!lnet_fault_attr_match(attr, src, dst, type, portal))
00480                 return false;
00481 
00482         /* match this rule, check delay rate now */
00483         spin_lock(&rule->dl_lock);
00484         if (rule->dl_delay_time != 0) { /* time based delay */
00485                 cfs_time_t now = cfs_time_current();
00486 
00487                 rule->dl_stat.fs_count++;
00488                 delay = cfs_time_aftereq(now, rule->dl_delay_time);
00489                 if (delay) {
00490                         if (cfs_time_after(now, rule->dl_time_base))
00491                                 rule->dl_time_base = now;
00492 
00493                         rule->dl_delay_time = rule->dl_time_base +
00494                                              cfs_time_seconds(cfs_rand() %
00495                                                 attr->u.delay.la_interval);
00496                         rule->dl_time_base += cfs_time_seconds(attr->u.delay.
00497                                                                la_interval);
00498 
00499                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Delay Rule %s->%s: next delay : "
00500                                       CFS_TIME_T"\n",
00501                                       libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_src),
00502                                       libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_dst),
00503                                       rule->dl_delay_time);
00504                 }
00505 
00506         } else { /* rate based delay */
00507                 __u64 count;
00508 
00509                 delay = rule->dl_stat.fs_count++ == rule->dl_delay_at;
00510                 /* generate the next random rate sequence */
00511                 count = rule->dl_stat.fs_count;
00512                 if (do_div(count, attr->u.delay.la_rate) == 0) {
00513                         rule->dl_delay_at = rule->dl_stat.fs_count +
00514                                             cfs_rand() % attr->u.delay.la_rate;
00515                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Delay Rule %s->%s: next delay: %lu\n",
00516                                libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_src),
00517                                libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_dst), rule->dl_delay_at);
00518                 }
00519         }
00520 
00521         if (!delay) {
00522                 spin_unlock(&rule->dl_lock);
00523                 return false;
00524         }
00525 
00526         /* delay this message, update counters */
00527         lnet_fault_stat_inc(&rule->dl_stat, type);
00528         rule->dl_stat.u.delay.ls_delayed++;
00529 
00530         list_add_tail(&msg->msg_list, &rule->dl_msg_list);
00531         msg->msg_delay_send = round_timeout(
00532                         cfs_time_shift(attr->u.delay.la_latency));
00533         if (rule->dl_msg_send == -1) {
00534                 rule->dl_msg_send = msg->msg_delay_send;
00535                 mod_timer(&rule->dl_timer, rule->dl_msg_send);
00536         }
00537 
00538         spin_unlock(&rule->dl_lock);
00539         return true;
00540 }
00541 
00546 bool
00547 lnet_delay_rule_match_locked(lnet_hdr_t *hdr, struct lnet_msg *msg)
00548 {
00549         struct lnet_delay_rule  *rule;
00550         lnet_nid_t               src = le64_to_cpu(hdr->src_nid);
00551         lnet_nid_t               dst = le64_to_cpu(hdr->dest_nid);
00552         unsigned int             typ = le32_to_cpu(hdr->type);
00553         unsigned int             ptl = -1;
00554 
00555         /* NB: called with hold of lnet_net_lock */
00556 
00557         /* NB: if Portal is specified, then only PUT and GET will be
00558          * filtered by delay rule */
00559         if (typ == LNET_MSG_PUT)
00560                 ptl = le32_to_cpu(hdr->msg.put.ptl_index);
00561         else if (typ == LNET_MSG_GET)
00562                 ptl = le32_to_cpu(hdr->msg.get.ptl_index);
00563 
00564         list_for_each_entry(rule, &the_lnet.ln_delay_rules, dl_link) {
00565                 if (delay_rule_match(rule, src, dst, typ, ptl, msg))
00566                         return true;
00567         }
00568 
00569         return false;
00570 }
00571 
00573 static void
00574 delayed_msg_check(struct lnet_delay_rule *rule, bool all,
00575                   struct list_head *msg_list)
00576 {
00577         struct lnet_msg *msg;
00578         struct lnet_msg *tmp;
00579         unsigned long    now = cfs_time_current();
00580 
00581         if (!all && rule->dl_msg_send > now)
00582                 return;
00583 
00584         spin_lock(&rule->dl_lock);
00585         list_for_each_entry_safe(msg, tmp, &rule->dl_msg_list, msg_list) {
00586                 if (!all && msg->msg_delay_send > now)
00587                         break;
00588 
00589                 msg->msg_delay_send = 0;
00590                 list_move_tail(&msg->msg_list, msg_list);
00591         }
00592 
00593         if (list_empty(&rule->dl_msg_list)) {
00594                 del_timer(&rule->dl_timer);
00595                 rule->dl_msg_send = -1;
00596 
00597         } else if (!list_empty(msg_list)) {
00598                 /* dequeued some timedout messages, update timer for the
00599                  * next delayed message on rule */
00600                 msg = list_entry(rule->dl_msg_list.next,
00601                                  struct lnet_msg, msg_list);
00602                 rule->dl_msg_send = msg->msg_delay_send;
00603                 mod_timer(&rule->dl_timer, rule->dl_msg_send);
00604         }
00605         spin_unlock(&rule->dl_lock);
00606 }
00607 
00608 static void
00609 delayed_msg_process(struct list_head *msg_list, bool drop)
00610 {
00611         struct lnet_msg *msg;
00612 
00613         while (!list_empty(msg_list)) {
00614                 struct lnet_ni *ni;
00615                 int             cpt;
00616                 int             rc;
00617 
00618                 msg = list_entry(msg_list->next, struct lnet_msg, msg_list);
00619                 LASSERT(msg->msg_rxpeer != NULL);
00620 
00621                 ni = msg->msg_rxpeer->lp_ni;
00622                 cpt = msg->msg_rx_cpt;
00623 
00624                 list_del_init(&msg->msg_list);
00625                 if (drop) {
00626                         rc = -ECANCELED;
00627 
00628                 } else if (!msg->msg_routing) {
00629                         rc = lnet_parse_local(ni, msg);
00630                         if (rc == 0)
00631                                 continue;
00632 
00633                 } else {
00634                         lnet_net_lock(cpt);
00635                         rc = lnet_parse_forward_locked(ni, msg);
00636                         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00637 
00638                         switch (rc) {
00639                         case LNET_CREDIT_OK:
00640                                 lnet_ni_recv(ni, msg->msg_private, msg, 0,
00641                                              0, msg->msg_len, msg->msg_len);
00642                         case LNET_CREDIT_WAIT:
00643                                 continue;
00644                         default: /* failures */
00645                                 break;
00646                         }
00647                 }
00648 
00649                 lnet_drop_message(ni, cpt, msg->msg_private, msg->msg_len);
00650                 lnet_finalize(ni, msg, rc);
00651         }
00652 }
00653 
00658 void
00659 lnet_delay_rule_check(void)
00660 {
00661         struct lnet_delay_rule  *rule;
00662         struct list_head         msgs;
00663 
00664         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&msgs);
00665         while (1) {
00666                 if (list_empty(&delay_dd.dd_sched_rules))
00667                         break;
00668 
00669                 spin_lock_bh(&delay_dd.dd_lock);
00670                 if (list_empty(&delay_dd.dd_sched_rules)) {
00671                         spin_unlock_bh(&delay_dd.dd_lock);
00672                         break;
00673                 }
00674 
00675                 rule = list_entry(delay_dd.dd_sched_rules.next,
00676                                   struct lnet_delay_rule, dl_sched_link);
00677                 list_del_init(&rule->dl_sched_link);
00678                 spin_unlock_bh(&delay_dd.dd_lock);
00679 
00680                 delayed_msg_check(rule, false, &msgs);
00681                 delay_rule_decref(rule); /* -1 for delay_dd.dd_sched_rules */
00682         }
00683 
00684         if (!list_empty(&msgs))
00685                 delayed_msg_process(&msgs, false);
00686 }
00687 
00689 static int
00690 lnet_delay_rule_daemon(void *arg)
00691 {
00692         delay_dd.dd_running = 1;
00693         wake_up(&delay_dd.dd_ctl_waitq);
00694 
00695         while (delay_dd.dd_running) {
00696                 wait_event_interruptible(delay_dd.dd_waitq,
00697                                          !delay_dd.dd_running ||
00698                                          !list_empty(&delay_dd.dd_sched_rules));
00699                 lnet_delay_rule_check();
00700         }
00701 
00702         /* in case more rules have been enqueued after my last check */
00703         lnet_delay_rule_check();
00704         delay_dd.dd_stopped = 1;
00705         wake_up(&delay_dd.dd_ctl_waitq);
00706 
00707         return 0;
00708 }
00709 
00710 static void
00711 delay_timer_cb(unsigned long arg)
00712 {
00713         struct lnet_delay_rule *rule = (struct lnet_delay_rule *)arg;
00714 
00715         spin_lock_bh(&delay_dd.dd_lock);
00716         if (list_empty(&rule->dl_sched_link) && delay_dd.dd_running) {
00717                 atomic_inc(&rule->dl_refcount);
00718                 list_add_tail(&rule->dl_sched_link, &delay_dd.dd_sched_rules);
00719                 wake_up(&delay_dd.dd_waitq);
00720         }
00721         spin_unlock_bh(&delay_dd.dd_lock);
00722 }
00723 
00729 int
00730 lnet_delay_rule_add(struct lnet_fault_attr *attr)
00731 {
00732         struct lnet_delay_rule *rule;
00733         int                     rc = 0;
00734         ENTRY;
00735 
00736         if (!((attr->u.delay.la_rate == 0) ^
00737               (attr->u.delay.la_interval == 0))) {
00738                 CDEBUG(D_NET,
00739                        "please provide either delay rate or delay interval, "
00740                        "but not both at the same time %d/%d\n",
00741                        attr->u.delay.la_rate, attr->u.delay.la_interval);
00742                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00743         }
00744 
00745         if (attr->u.delay.la_latency == 0) {
00746                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "delay latency cannot be zero\n");
00747                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00748         }
00749 
00750         if (lnet_fault_attr_validate(attr) != 0)
00751                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00752 
00753         CFS_ALLOC_PTR(rule);
00754         if (rule == NULL)
00755                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00756 
00757         mutex_lock(&delay_dd.dd_mutex);
00758         if (!delay_dd.dd_running) {
00759                 struct task_struct *task;
00760 
00761                 /* NB: although LND threads will process delayed message
00762                  * in lnet_finalize, but there is no guarantee that LND
00763                  * threads will be waken up if no other message needs to
00764                  * be handled.
00765                  * Only one daemon thread, performance is not the concern
00766                  * of this simualation module.
00767                  */
00768                 task = kthread_run(lnet_delay_rule_daemon, NULL, "lnet_dd");
00769                 if (IS_ERR(task)) {
00770                         rc = PTR_ERR(task);
00771                         GOTO(failed, rc);
00772                 }
00773                 wait_event(delay_dd.dd_ctl_waitq, delay_dd.dd_running);
00774         }
00775 
00776         init_timer(&rule->dl_timer);
00777         rule->dl_timer.function = delay_timer_cb;
00778         rule->dl_timer.data = (unsigned long)rule;
00779 
00780         spin_lock_init(&rule->dl_lock);
00781         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rule->dl_msg_list);
00782         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rule->dl_sched_link);
00783 
00784         rule->dl_attr = *attr;
00785         if (attr->u.delay.la_interval != 0) {
00786                 rule->dl_time_base = cfs_time_shift(attr->u.delay.la_interval);
00787                 rule->dl_delay_time = cfs_time_shift(cfs_rand() %
00788                                                      attr->u.delay.la_interval);
00789         } else {
00790                 rule->dl_delay_at = cfs_rand() % attr->u.delay.la_rate;
00791         }
00792 
00793         rule->dl_msg_send = -1;
00794 
00795         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00796         atomic_set(&rule->dl_refcount, 1);
00797         list_add(&rule->dl_link, &the_lnet.ln_delay_rules);
00798         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00799 
00800         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Added delay rule: src %s, dst %s, rate %d\n",
00801                libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_src), libcfs_nid2str(attr->fa_src),
00802                attr->u.delay.la_rate);
00803 
00804         mutex_unlock(&delay_dd.dd_mutex);
00805         RETURN(0);
00806  failed:
00807         mutex_unlock(&delay_dd.dd_mutex);
00808         CFS_FREE_PTR(rule);
00809         return rc;
00810 }
00811 
00822 int
00823 lnet_delay_rule_del(lnet_nid_t src, lnet_nid_t dst, bool shutdown)
00824 {
00825         struct lnet_delay_rule *rule;
00826         struct lnet_delay_rule  *tmp;
00827         struct list_head        rule_list;
00828         struct list_head        msg_list;
00829         int                     n = 0;
00830         bool                    cleanup;
00831         ENTRY;
00832 
00833         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rule_list);
00834         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&msg_list);
00835 
00836         if (shutdown)
00837                 src = dst = 0;
00838 
00839         mutex_lock(&delay_dd.dd_mutex);
00840         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00841 
00842         list_for_each_entry_safe(rule, tmp, &the_lnet.ln_delay_rules, dl_link) {
00843                 if (rule->dl_attr.fa_src != src && src != 0)
00844                         continue;
00845 
00846                 if (rule->dl_attr.fa_dst != dst && dst != 0)
00847                         continue;
00848 
00849                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Remove delay rule: src %s->dst: %s (1/%d, %d)\n",
00850                        libcfs_nid2str(rule->dl_attr.fa_src),
00851                        libcfs_nid2str(rule->dl_attr.fa_dst),
00852                        rule->dl_attr.u.delay.la_rate,
00853                        rule->dl_attr.u.delay.la_interval);
00854                 /* refcount is taken over by rule_list */
00855                 list_move(&rule->dl_link, &rule_list);
00856         }
00857 
00858         /* check if we need to shutdown delay_daemon */
00859         cleanup = list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_delay_rules) &&
00860                   !list_empty(&rule_list);
00861         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00862 
00863         list_for_each_entry_safe(rule, tmp, &rule_list, dl_link) {
00864                 list_del_init(&rule->dl_link);
00865 
00866                 del_timer_sync(&rule->dl_timer);
00867                 delayed_msg_check(rule, true, &msg_list);
00868                 delay_rule_decref(rule); /* -1 for the_lnet.ln_delay_rules */
00869                 n++;
00870         }
00871 
00872         if (cleanup) { /* no more delay rule, shutdown delay_daemon */
00873                 LASSERT(delay_dd.dd_running);
00874                 delay_dd.dd_running = 0;
00875                 wake_up(&delay_dd.dd_waitq);
00876 
00877                 while (!delay_dd.dd_stopped)
00878                         wait_event(delay_dd.dd_ctl_waitq, delay_dd.dd_stopped);
00879         }
00880         mutex_unlock(&delay_dd.dd_mutex);
00881 
00882         if (!list_empty(&msg_list))
00883                 delayed_msg_process(&msg_list, shutdown);
00884 
00885         RETURN(n);
00886 }
00887 
00891 int
00892 lnet_delay_rule_list(int pos, struct lnet_fault_attr *attr,
00893                     struct lnet_fault_stat *stat)
00894 {
00895         struct lnet_delay_rule *rule;
00896         int                     cpt;
00897         int                     i = 0;
00898         int                     rc = -ENOENT;
00899         ENTRY;
00900 
00901         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00902         list_for_each_entry(rule, &the_lnet.ln_delay_rules, dl_link) {
00903                 if (i++ < pos)
00904                         continue;
00905 
00906                 spin_lock(&rule->dl_lock);
00907                 *attr = rule->dl_attr;
00908                 *stat = rule->dl_stat;
00909                 spin_unlock(&rule->dl_lock);
00910                 rc = 0;
00911                 break;
00912         }
00913 
00914         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00915         RETURN(rc);
00916 }
00917 
00921 void
00922 lnet_delay_rule_reset(void)
00923 {
00924         struct lnet_delay_rule *rule;
00925         int                     cpt;
00926         ENTRY;
00927 
00928         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00929 
00930         list_for_each_entry(rule, &the_lnet.ln_delay_rules, dl_link) {
00931                 struct lnet_fault_attr *attr = &rule->dl_attr;
00932 
00933                 spin_lock(&rule->dl_lock);
00934 
00935                 memset(&rule->dl_stat, 0, sizeof(rule->dl_stat));
00936                 if (attr->u.delay.la_rate != 0) {
00937                         rule->dl_delay_at = cfs_rand() % attr->u.delay.la_rate;
00938                 } else {
00939                         rule->dl_delay_time = cfs_time_shift(cfs_rand() %
00940                                                 attr->u.delay.la_interval);
00941                         rule->dl_time_base = cfs_time_shift(attr->u.delay.
00942                                                                   la_interval);
00943                 }
00944                 spin_unlock(&rule->dl_lock);
00945         }
00946 
00947         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00948         EXIT;
00949 }
00950 
00951 int
00952 lnet_fault_ctl(int opc, struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data)
00953 {
00954         struct lnet_fault_attr *attr;
00955         struct lnet_fault_stat *stat;
00956 
00957         attr = (struct lnet_fault_attr *)data->ioc_inlbuf1;
00958 
00959         switch (opc) {
00960         default:
00961                 return -EINVAL;
00962 
00963         case LNET_CTL_DROP_ADD:
00964                 if (attr == NULL)
00965                         return -EINVAL;
00966 
00967                 return lnet_drop_rule_add(attr);
00968 
00969         case LNET_CTL_DROP_DEL:
00970                 if (attr == NULL)
00971                         return -EINVAL;
00972 
00973                 data->ioc_count = lnet_drop_rule_del(attr->fa_src,
00974                                                      attr->fa_dst);
00975                 return 0;
00976 
00977         case LNET_CTL_DROP_RESET:
00978                 lnet_drop_rule_reset();
00979                 return 0;
00980 
00981         case LNET_CTL_DROP_LIST:
00982                 stat = (struct lnet_fault_stat *)data->ioc_inlbuf2;
00983                 if (attr == NULL || stat == NULL)
00984                         return -EINVAL;
00985 
00986                 return lnet_drop_rule_list(data->ioc_count, attr, stat);
00987 
00988         case LNET_CTL_DELAY_ADD:
00989                 if (attr == NULL)
00990                         return -EINVAL;
00991 
00992                 return lnet_delay_rule_add(attr);
00993 
00994         case LNET_CTL_DELAY_DEL:
00995                 if (attr == NULL)
00996                         return -EINVAL;
00997 
00998                 data->ioc_count = lnet_delay_rule_del(attr->fa_src,
00999                                                       attr->fa_dst, false);
01000                 return 0;
01001 
01002         case LNET_CTL_DELAY_RESET:
01003                 lnet_delay_rule_reset();
01004                 return 0;
01005 
01006         case LNET_CTL_DELAY_LIST:
01007                 stat = (struct lnet_fault_stat *)data->ioc_inlbuf2;
01008                 if (attr == NULL || stat == NULL)
01009                         return -EINVAL;
01010 
01011                 return lnet_delay_rule_list(data->ioc_count, attr, stat);
01012         }
01013 }
01014 
01015 int
01016 lnet_fault_init(void)
01017 {
01018         CLASSERT(LNET_PUT_BIT == 1 << LNET_MSG_PUT);
01019         CLASSERT(LNET_ACK_BIT == 1 << LNET_MSG_ACK);
01020         CLASSERT(LNET_GET_BIT == 1 << LNET_MSG_GET);
01021         CLASSERT(LNET_REPLY_BIT == 1 << LNET_MSG_REPLY);
01022 
01023         mutex_init(&delay_dd.dd_mutex);
01024         spin_lock_init(&delay_dd.dd_lock);
01025         init_waitqueue_head(&delay_dd.dd_waitq);
01026         init_waitqueue_head(&delay_dd.dd_ctl_waitq);
01027         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&delay_dd.dd_sched_rules);
01028 
01029         return 0;
01030 }
01031 
01032 void
01033 lnet_fault_fini(void)
01034 {
01035         lnet_drop_rule_del(0, 0);
01036         lnet_delay_rule_del(0, 0, true);
01037 
01038         LASSERT(list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_drop_rules));
01039         LASSERT(list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_delay_rules));
01040         LASSERT(list_empty(&delay_dd.dd_sched_rules));
01041 }
